days.title: 2 weeks until christmas
days.message: To kick off this countdown, here's a cute picture of us hehe
days.caption:
10/25/2024 
 Seattle waterfront ft. a shy goofball

days.title: 13 days until christmas
days.message: Here's to some new year resolutions that probably includes working out of sorts
days.caption: I was gonna get you one already and then you went and put it on your secret santa wishlist - Aiyah, so I just checked it off and bought it. Come redeem.

days.title: happy friday the 13th!
days.message:
Since it's about to be the weekend and weekend means drinking and drinking means quad shots 
 Don't worry! 
 I've secured you a sub a friend card in the form of AQT!
days.caption: Hehehe, show AQT this when you don't want your quad or single - what a homie!

days.title: happy saturday!
days.message: I'm really glad I get to spend my weekends with my bb gurl - let's do a mask today!
days.caption: Can't believe this was one the first times you slept over and we were comfy enuf to do face masks, just chilling in bed. O.o

days.title: part one of the secret santa festivities!
days.message: Also the day before a work day, sadge. I got you something from Costco to help keep you warm!

days.title: mondays...
days.message: My cuddle buddies are goneeee hmph.
days.caption:
8/10/2024 
 hehehe, my sleepy babies

days.title: 46 degs
days.message: The forecast says it's gonna be 46 degrees today, the coldest day of the week. Check the bottom of your duffel bag. Can't have my silly goose getting sick.

days.title: one more week to go!
days.message: The holiday spirit has yet to hit me even though we were already partying last year at this time!
days.caption:
12/17/2023 
 The cute one dollar accessories lol

days.title: 6 days until christmas
days.message: Last year at this time I went to Vancouver with hifwens, sadge you couldn't go.
days.caption:
12/19/2023 
 Me snapping you finger hearts b/c I miss you.

days.title: the friday before christmas
days.message: Finally Friday! I present to you a massage ticket for when you need a lil rub ;)
days.caption:
6/3/2023 
 :3

days.title: 4 more days!
days.message: I can't believe it's going to be xmas already!
days.caption:
12/8/2022 
 Sugar is so cute in this pic <3 Kyah, this pic so cringe though... hehe

days.title: t-3 days
days.message: Got you something long overdue - mouth guards!! Can't have you grinding your teeth at night constantly, smh. These are suppose to be able to mold to your teeth once you heat it up. Hopefully it works and it's comfy.
